description.text: At 1st level, a far strike monk gains Quick Draw as a bonus feat, even if he doesn't meet the prerequisites. At 4th level, he gains Shot on the Run as a bonus feat, even if he doesn't meet the prerequisites. At 8th level, when using the Shot on the Run feat, he can make a second ranged attack with a –5 penalty at any point during his movement. At 15th level, he can make a third ranged attack with a –10 penalty at any point during his movement.
